summary:
The code defines a module for handling HTTP responses in an asynchronous web framework (aiohttp). It imports necessary modules and defines constants, classes, and functions related to HTTP response handling. The main class, StreamResponse, represents an HTTP response and provides methods for setting headers, cookies, status codes, and body content. It also supports compression and chunked transfer encoding. The module also provides a json_response function for creating JSON responses. The code includes various utility functions and mixins for handling various aspects of the HTTP response.

The code defines a module for handling HTTP responses.
```

该模块用于在异步Web框架（aiohttp）中处理HTTP响应。它导入必要的模块并定义与HTTP响应处理相关的常量、类和函数。主要类StreamResponse表示HTTP响应，提供设置头部、Cookie、状态码和正文内容的方法，并支持压缩和分块传输编码。模块还提供json_response函数用于创建JSON响应。代码包含各种实用函数和混入类，用于处理HTTP响应的不同方面。

```
